snippet: James B. Stewart, in his Common Sense column, says that the trustee's report into the collapse of MF Global, the brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine, contains some revelations.
abstract: James B. Stewart, in his Common Sense column, says that the trustee's report into the collapse of MF Global, the brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine, contains some revelations.

headline.main: Some Light on the MF Global Mystery
